EmailTemplate.description: [subject line A] Infographic: How your ATM channel will transform with NCR SelfServ 21 [subject line B] NCR SelfServ 21 – the digital first ATM https://www.ncr.com/content/dam/web/blogs/banking/NCR_SelfServ21_Connecting_the_World_with_Cash_Product_Infographic.pdf
EmailTemplate.name: 08-16-22 BNK SelfServ 21 SEA Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Infographic: How your ATM channel will transform with NCR SelfServ 21
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Transforming the ATM channel for a digital first world isn’t easy. NCR can help. Our combination of software, services and hardware creates personalized, digital-first experiences to protect and grow your brand. NCR SelfServ 21, our newest compact-footprint lobby cash dispenser, helps you meet your corporate environmental goals, reduce total cost of ownership and manage risk. Designed to maximize ease of use, it puts the customer in control to deliver a self-directed experience. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
